mapper.select: select top 200 uif.UserID, uif.PersonNO, uif.UserName, dl.departmentID, dep.ALLname, uif.PetName, uif.Title,Sex, uif.Telephone, uif.MobileTelephone, uif.Fax, uif.Email, uif.WebAddr, uif.Activity from UserInfo uif left join DepartUserList dl on uif.UserID = dl.UserID left join Department dep on dl.departmentID = dep.RecNum where uif.Activity = 1

select [DepartmentName], [DepartmentID], [PersonNO], [CardID], [UserName], [APBID], [APBName], [LastAPB], [LastAPBName], [InTime], [LastInTime], [RdrDvcID], [LastRdrDvcID] from VIEW_APBCardHolder where datediff(day,intime,GETDATE()) = 0 order by intime desc
